EXPERIENCE MOVIES VISUALIZATION ABOUT

Sunny Bunny

Project type: Short animated movie
Year: 2022
Role: Lead Lighting Artist
Software: Maya / Unreal
Skills: Research / Shading / Lighting / Rendering

Short movie for water park in Austria.

Responsibilities:

  • Research and develop lighting/rendering workflow inside Unreal
  • Shading, Lighting, and Rendering for over 50 shots
  • Create FX using Niagara
    • Fancy transition between environments
    • Particle emission
    • Floating particles
    • Rain
    • Snow
